ygData.subject: Re: The benefits of being Techno-organic

Inferno could see this one was persistent.
"Until I see the Royalty well again I will not leave the Royalty's 
side.  We can talk more of this after then."  Inferno explained as 
the shuttle flew.  He turned his head to look out the window.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> Azure: Oh, please! Don't be so stiff! You know that if you refuse 
such
> an offer, I could feel... (he thought for a moment) ...insulted...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
wrote:
> > "Only the royalty may command upgrades of his soldiers."  Inferno
> > insisted. He then turned and walked onboard the shuttle.  He 
took a
> > seat and waited for the launch.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > > Azure finally smile, but it was in no way a reassuring smile.
> > > 
> > > Azure: Good. I would like to be present too. You know, 
Inferno, your
> > > loyalty is to be commended... You would almost be worthy of an
> > > upgrade, don't you think?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > "Very well.  Lead the way."  Inferno replied roughly.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Trooper's leader:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "Can we let'0s go now???"said the trooper
> > > > >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> > > > >   From: CatMaster o 
> > > > >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> > > > >   Sent: Sunday, July 24, 2005 9:09 PM
> > > > >   Subject: Re: The benefits of being Techno-organic
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > >   Inferno paused for a moment as he considered this.  He
> > reluctently 
> > > > >   lowered his gun and put it back in it's holster.
> > > > >   "Very well.  But I insist on being present during his
> repairs."   
> > > > >   The ant bot said firmly.
